message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $140 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $130?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I am willing to negotiate the price down to $135. I hope this proposal better suits your needs.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $130?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. In light of that, I am prepared to offer the product at $132. This price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget considerations. I hope this proposal works for you.
